products.name: Micellar Water
description: An all-in-one makeup remover enriched with natural ingredients that gently cleanses, hydrates, soothes & removes even water-resistant makeup from the face and eye area.

products.name: Vitamin C Cleansing Gel
description: Vitamin C Cleansing Gel 150ml. A Lighter, Smoother, Firmer.A radiance boosting cleanser enriched with powerful antioxidants to efficiently defend against environmental aggressors.

products.name: Mattifying Fluid SPF50+
description: Mattifying Sunscreen SPF50+ (For Combination to Oily Skin) 50ml. Mattifies, Hydrates, Protects. An oil-free, ultra light fluid that guarantees optimum broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection against the harmful effects of the sun, while regulating sebum & maintaining a matte finish. Enriched with antioxidants for maximum protection all day long.

products.name: Vitamin C Serum 10%
description: Vitamin C Serum 10% . Lighter, Smoother, Firmer. A radiance boosting formula enriched with potent antioxidants to rejuvenate your skin for a visibly energized, brighter, even-toned and youthful look. Enriched with Vitamin E and Rose hips for intense nourishment. Accompanied by Collagen and Hyaluronic acid’s anti-aging properties that will effectively reduce the appearance of wrinkles and restore firmness.

products.name: Lightening Hyaluronic Acid Serum
description: Lightening Hyaluronic Acid Serum 30ml. Lightens, Hydrates. A rich ultra-replenishing serum is rich in antioxidants to illuminate, re-plump, and quench thirsty skin. An intense hydration booster that will retain the skin’s moisture content and keep you moisturized and plumped all day long.Enriched with Lightening and antiaging ingredients including Collagen, Vitamin C & E to restore a bright, youthful radiance and improve elasticity and firmness.A rich texture formulated with Vitamin B5 to leave the skin feeling supple and hydrated to the touch.

products.name: Tinted Sun Fluid Hyaluronic Acid Gel Cream
description: Tinted Sun Fluid Hyaluronic Acid Gel Cream: Not just your ordinary tinted sunscreen, this 3 in 1 innovative oil-free, ultra-light formula serves also as your lightweight daily foundation with light-medium coverage to give you that natural finish you’ve been waiting for! Guarantees an optimum broad-spectrum UVA/UVB protection against the harmful effects of the sun, while regulating sebum & maintaining a fresh look.Enriched with antioxidants for maximum protection all day long. With added Hyaluronic acid for a smooth, hydrated finish.

products.name: Gold Caviar Serum
products.description: Dermatique GOLD 24K CAVIAR SERUM . Enriched with pure ﬁne 24K gold particles & Caviar extract that will help hydrate, illuminate and plump fatigued skin for a ﬁrmer, refreshed complexion.Caviar extract is known for carrying an abundance of moisture, vitamins, and nutrients to reduce wrinkles and elasticity while Gold promotes a luminous, moisturized complexion.

products.name: Shine Control Moisturizer
description: Shine Control Moisturizer 40ml. Purifies, Soothes, Hydrates. A lightweight hydrating compensating treatment formulated specifically to suit combination to oily skin without leaving a shiny appearance. Enriched with Zinc PCA to regulate sebum production & Aloe Vera to calm inflammation along with Ceramides to lock in moisture & provide intense hydration.

products.name: Purifying Toner
description: Purifying Toner for Oily Skin .Purifies, Regulates sebum, Reduces blackheads. A mild alcohol and mineral oil-free toner combining the multiple action of removing traces of dirt, oil, and makeup. Enriched with Rose water, tea tree extract, Capryloyl Salicylic acid, Aloe Vera extract, Niacinamide & Witch Hazel, an effective combination to purify, soothe, and protect the skin leaving it fresh and clear.

products.name: Purifying Cleansing Gel
description: Purifying Cleansing Gel . Purifies, Soothes, Hydrates. A facial cleanser that gently purifies, exfoliates, and limits the formation of acne while regulating the secretion of excess oils.

products.name: Mattifying Fluid SPF50+
description: Mattifying Sunscreen SPF50+ (For Combination to Oily Skin) 50ml. Mattifies, Hydrates, Protects. An oil-free, ultra light fluid that guarantees optimum broad spectrum UVA/UVB protection against the harmful effects of the sun, while regulating sebum & maintaining a matte finish. Enriched with antioxidants for maximum protection all day long.

products.name: Whitening deodorant
description: Whitening Deodorant . All-in-one safe & effective formula that lightens dark areas, delays hair growth, soothes, hydrates, and refreshes underarms. Enriched with Sepiwhite™️ technology, Vitamin C & E, Hyaluronic acid, Aloe Vera, Licorice & Cucumber extract combined with Pollushield™️ anti-pollution complex. Clean & bright all day long, gentle on the most sensitive skin.

products.name: Ultra-Rich Moisturizer
description: Ultra-Rich Moisturizer 150ml . Soothes, Hydrates, Nourishes. A unique formula that delivers rich hydrating power to keep your skin feeling soft, smooth and moisturized all day long. Enriched with Ceramides, Shea butter, Aloe Vera, Chamomile and jojoba oil for extra nourishment and immediate comfort. Instantly locks in intense hydration and continuously release it whenever your skin needs it.
